diseases.name: Foot and Mouth Disease
diseases.symptoms: Fever, blisters in mouth and feet, lameness, excessive salivation, loss of appetite
diseases.causes: Virus transmission through contact, contaminated feed/water
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, biosecurity measures, quarantine new animals
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, antibiotic treatment for secondary infections, isolation
diseases.seasonality: All year, peaks in dry season

diseases.name: Mastitis
diseases.symptoms: Swollen udder, abnormal milk (clots, blood), fever, loss of appetite
diseases.causes: Bacterial infection, poor milking hygiene, stress
diseases.prevention: Proper milking hygiene, clean bedding, regular udder health checks
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic treatment, anti-inflammatory drugs, milking hygiene

diseases.name: Lumpy Skin Disease
diseases.symptoms: Firm nodules on skin, fever, reduced milk production, loss of appetite
diseases.causes: Virus transmission by insects, contact with infected animals
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, vector control, quarantine new animals
diseases.treatment: Supportive care, antibiotic treatment for secondary infections

diseases.name: Blackleg
diseases.symptoms: Sudden death, lameness, swelling in muscles, fever, depression
diseases.causes: Bacterial spores in soil, wounds, deep muscle injuries
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, avoid deep wounds, proper wound care
diseases.treatment: Emergency vaccination, antibiotic treatment, surgical drainage
diseases.seasonality: All year, peaks in wet season

diseases.name: Anthrax
diseases.symptoms: Sudden death, bleeding from body openings, high fever, difficulty breathing
diseases.causes: Bacterial spores in soil, contaminated feed/water
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, avoid contaminated areas, proper carcass disposal
diseases.treatment: Immediate veterinary attention, antibiotic treatment, isolation
diseases.seasonality: All year, peaks in dry season

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.symptoms: Coughing, difficulty breathing, fever, nasal discharge, loss of appetite
diseases.causes: Bacterial or viral infection, poor ventilation, stress
diseases.prevention: Good ventilation, proper nutrition, stress reduction, vaccination
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic treatment, anti-inflammatory drugs, supportive care
diseases.seasonality: All year, peaks in cold season

diseases.name: Mange
diseases.symptoms: Itching, hair loss, skin thickening, restlessness, weight loss
diseases.prevention: Regular health checks, quarantine new animals, clean environment

diseases.name: Ringworm
diseases.symptoms: Circular lesions, hair loss, scaly skin, mild itching
diseases.prevention: Good hygiene, avoid contact with infected animals, clean environment
diseases.treatment: Antifungal treatment, topical medication, environmental cleaning

diseases.name: Bloat
diseases.symptoms: Distended abdomen, difficulty breathing, restlessness, loss of appetite
diseases.causes: Fermentation gas accumulation, diet changes, obstruction
diseases.prevention: Proper feeding management, avoid sudden diet changes, monitor grazing
diseases.treatment: Emergency treatment, stomach tube, anti-foaming agents

model_info.description: Livestock disease detection model trained on agricultural images
